Events

end

Emitted once a query has completed executing and emitting all rows.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
meta Bucket.FtsQueryResponse.Meta
Since:
  • 2.1.7 (stability: uncommitted)

error

Emitted if an error occurs while executing a query.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
error Error
Since:
  • 2.1.7 (stability: uncommitted)

row

Emitted whenever a new row is available from a queries result set.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
row Object
meta Bucket.FtsQueryResponse.Meta
Since:
  • 2.1.7 (stability: uncommitted)

rows

Emitted whenever all rows are available from a queries result set.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
rows Array.<Object>
meta Bucket.FtsQueryResponse.Meta
Since:
  • 2.1.7 (stability: uncommitted)

connect

Connected Event. Invoked once the connection has been established successfully.

Since:
  • 2.0.0 (stability: committed)

error

Error Event. Invoked if the connection encounters any errors without having an operation context available to handle the error.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
err Error

The error that occured while attempting to connect to the cluster.
Since:
  • 2.0.0 (stability: committed)
